creditline: Gift of the artist in memory of Shelly Ross
inscription:
Titled in pencil, LL: meeting house

Incribed in penicl, LR: t.p.
markings: Artist's monogram, stamped in red ink
medium: Color woodcut and collage on Japan paper, trial proof
signed: LRC of central image, in pencil: [t.p./ on 8.26.1981/ Steven Sorman]; artist's monogram on top of signature, in red, stamped: [(square inside circle)]
title: Meeting House
